page.title: 04HARLOW CHILDREN'S FEARS .
page.content: {We asked some ten year olds what their {fears and worries about the future {were.}Many of them feared death. Others said the following : "I am worried that I might not get a job.I might even be homeless and wandering the streets ." "I worry about coal and other fuels running out ." "My worries are that in the next couple of years there will be a nuclear war with Russia and we shall be destroyed and I shall be the last survivor ,wandering around with radiation sickness" "I fear a third world war happening ; then I would have to join up and fight against other countries ." "I want to live to the year 10,000 and see the new wonders ! I dont want to miss seeing the new developments.I'll probably live to A.D.2070 ."
